title: Improved package : petsc
body:
##### Modifications :
- [x] added variants for `mpi`, `shared`, `double` (floating point precision)
- [x] added variants for a bunch of supported dependencies
##### Note :

After `do_install` the build will possibly fail with an error that is unrelated to the package modifications:
